#include "iostream"
#include "string"

using namespace std;

int main() {

	int t;
	cin >> t;
	string str;
	cin >> str;

	string queries;
	while(t--) {
	
	cin >> queries;
		
		while(str.find(queries)<str.length())
		str.erase(str.find(queries), queries.length());
	
	}

	str.length()>0?
		cout << str << endl:
		cout << '0' << endl;
		
return 0;
}
